author: Constantino (Constante) Ribalaigua Vert
description: A Daiquiri No.1 with a tang of grapefruit and hint of maraschino. Essentially a Hemingway Special Daiquiri (Papa Doble) Daiquiri for folk without the great author's constitution or love of the sours.
name: Daiquiri No.3
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
